percent.description: The percentage value of the progress bar, which is of numeric type, is 0-100
percent.description_zh: 进度条百分比值，为数值类型，0-100

round.description: Whether the ends of the progress bar are semi-circles
round.description_zh: 进度条两端是否为半圆

type.description: If set, the active-color value will be invalidated

active-color.description: The color of the active part of the progress bar
active-color.description_zh: 进度条激活部分的颜色

inactive-color.description: The background color of the progress bar, which is gray by default
inactive-color.description_zh: 进度条的底色，默认为灰色

show-percent.description: Whether or not to display the current percentage value value inside the progress bar
show-percent.description_zh: 是否在进度条内部显示当前的百分比值数值

height.description: The height of the progress bar, in rpx

striped.description: Whether or not to display the streak on the active part of the progress bar
striped.description_zh: 是否显示进度条激活部分的条纹

striped-active.description: Whether the stripes have a dynamic effect
striped-active.description_zh: 条纹是否具有动态效果
